metadata.name: File Download Using ProtocolHandler.exe
metadata.comment: Detects usage of "ProtocolHandler" to download files. Downloaded files will be located in the cache folder (for example - %LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\IE)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\protocolhandler.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('protocolhandler.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ftp://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('https://'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of "ProtocolHandler" to download files. Downloaded files will be located in the cache folder (for example - %LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\IE)
